error._primary: You may only configure a single Exchange account.

error._secondary: Changes to Exchange account configuration will take place after you quit and restart Evolution.

error._primary: The Exchange account will be removed when you quit Evolution
The Exchange account will be disabled when you quit Evolution
Cannot change password due to configuration problems.
Server rejected password because it is too weak.
error._secondary: Try again with a different password.
Make sure the username and password are correct and try again.

This probably means that your server requires you to specify the Windows domain name as part of your username (eg, "DOMAIN\user").
Or you might have just typed your password wrong.

error._primary: Mailbox for {0} is not on this server.
The Exchange server is not compatible with Exchange Connector.
error._secondary: The server is runinng Exchange 5.5. Exchange Connector supports Microsoft Exchange 2000 and 2003 only.

error._primary: Could not find Exchange Web Storage System.
error._secondary: If OWA is running on a different path, you must specify that in the account configuration dialog.
Make sure the server name is spelled correctly and try again.
Make sure the URL is correct and try again.

error._primary: You have exceeded your quota for storing mails on this server.
error._secondary: You will not be able to either send or recieve mails now.

error._primary: You are nearing your quota available for storing mails on this server.
error._secondary: You will not be able to send mails till you clear up some space by deleting some mails.

error._primary: You are nearing your quota available for storing mails on this server.
error._secondary: Try to clear up some space by deleting some mails.

Exchange Connector requires access to certain functionality on the Exchange Server that appears to be disabled or blocked. (This is usually unintentional.) Your Exchange Administrator will need to enable this functionality in order for you to be able to use Ximian Connector.
For information to provide to your Exchange administrator, please follow the link below:
http://support.novell.com/cgi-bin/search/searchtid.cgi?/ximian/ximian328.html
Could not configure Exchange account because an unknown error occurred. Check the URL, username, and password, and try again.
